itainteasybeinggreen.name: It Ain't Easy Being Green
itainteasybeinggreen.description: Collect one of every Room card with the Discontinued rarity!

unlucky.name: Unlucky
unlucky.description: Collect 10 exact copies of a card!

bronzecollector.name: Bronze Collector
bronzecollector.description: Collect 20 cards with the type of 'Rare'!

silversaver.name: Silver Saver
silversaver.description: Collect 20 cards with the type of 'Super Rare'!

goldhoarder.name: Gold Hoarder
goldhoarder.description: Collect 20 cards with the type of 'Ultra Rare'!

editorenthusiast.name: Editor Enthusiast
editorenthusiast.description: Collect all non-DC rarites of the Sound, VFX, Rows, and Rooms cards!

s2maestro.name: Season 2 Maestro
s2maestro.description: Collect every single, non-statistic, Season 2 card!

s4maestro.name: Season 4 Maestro
s4maestro.description: Collect every single, non-meme, Season 4 card!

s5maestro.name: Season 5 Maestro
s5maestro.description: Collect every single, non-weed, Season 5 card!

cardmaestro.name: Card Maestro
cardmaestro.description: Collect every single card that's currently available! This medal is not permanent, and will be removed every time new cards are added.

pyramidal.name: Pyramidal
pyramidal.description: Collect 50 exact copies of a card!

easytogetdebugmedal.name: Easy to get debug medal lol
easytogetdebugmedal.description: just get a rare samurai lmao
